card.heading: Bench Press Training
card.description: Master the classic Barbell Bench Press with proper form and trainer support. Ideal for building a powerful chest and upper body.
card.benefits: Builds chest, triceps, and shoulders Increases upper-body strength Trainer-assisted for safety

card.heading: Seated Cable Row Workout
card.description: Strengthen your back with guided Cable Row sessions using commercial-grade machines. Perfect for posture correction and pulling strength.
card.benefits: Improves upper & middle back strength Supports better posture Targets lats and rhomboids

card.heading: Battle Rope Conditioning
card.description: Burn calories and build stamina with High-Intensity Battle Rope training. A full-body workout for explosive power.
card.benefits: High-intensity fat burner Builds arms, shoulders, and core Great for cardio and endurance

card.heading: Core & Abs Training
card.description: Engage your core with traditional and dynamic ab workouts, including sit-ups, crunches, and circuit-based core routines.
card.benefits: Builds strong abdominal muscles Improves balance and stability Increases overall core strength

card.heading: Deadlift Strength Training
card.description: Learn and perfect the Deadlift under expert supervision. A compound move that trains your whole posterior chain and boosts strength.
card.benefits: Builds total body power Targets glutes, hamstrings & back Boosts functional strength
